All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiRequestBuilder
Used to build the set of relevant translation requests made to the API of a LLM or a translation service, so that the translation of specific contents is carried out.
ApiSpeech
Interface for API access aimed at cognitive speech and text-to-speech functionalities.
ApiTranslation
Interface for API access aimed at automatic translation.
ApiVision
Interface for API access aimed at image description and the validation of input images.
AutoTranslation
Automatic translation mode (translates content to a specific language via requests to a LLM), which has access to a translation cache with past translation results.
AzureApiSpeech
API access for text-to-speech functionality provided by Cognitive Speech services.
AzureApiVision
API access for image description functionality provided by Computer Vision services.
BusyPanel
Implementation of a rotating, busy panel, to symbolize buffer/wait time in the execution of another thread.
CardAuto
 
CardDefault
 
CardEnd
 
CardFile
 
CardImage
 
CardInfo
 
CardMain
 
CardManual
 
CardMode
 
CardTextToSpeech
 
ExceptionHandler
Handles exceptions that arise from the program's logic, due to: - execution interruptions - api time outs and other issues - not found resources - incorrect format of provided resources - etc.
FileLingualApp
 
FileManager
Manager for the translation of one source file into one or more languages, and saving those results into user's storage.
FileUtil
Used to extract information from files.
HashUtil
Used to compute the 512-bit hash of a string.
HelpDefault
 
HelpFile
 
HelpImage
 
HelpManual
 
HelpMode
 
HelpResults
 
HelpTTS
 
IDE
Manages the opening of a text editing tool/Integrated Development Environment in the user's native Operating System, with the aim of editing one or several files found in specific file paths.
IdeException
Exception that arises when the user does not have a default application for editing files of a given format in their sytem.
ImageException
Exception that arises when an image file provided by the user is not valid: - invalid size - unreadable - not found
IncompleteResultsException
Exception that arises due to issues when the results retrieved are not complete.
LanguageException
Exception that arises when specified locale is not supported by application (in terms of API access, speech algorithms...).
LanguageMenuItem
Represents a numbered menu item for language selection in a JMenu.
LocaleFile
Localization file, abstraction of a .properties key-value pair file saved/to-be-saved in user's storage, in a specific language.
LocaleParser
Parser for localization alpha-2 codes and language names.
MainWindow
Main Window of the application.
ManualTranslation
Manual translation mode.
OpenAIApiRequestBuilder
Used to build the set of relevant requests to be submitted to the Chat Completions API provided by OpenAi, so that the translation of specific contents is carried out.
OpenAIApiTranslation
Provides access to OpenAI'S ChatCompletions API in order to request the translation of a set of texts found in a .properties file.
PropertiesException
Exception that arises when .properties file (found in /resources or not) do not comply with expected format: - invalid file name format (i.e. extension) - invalid content (format, information, etc)
PropertyLoader
Utilities method with regards to Properties objects and .properties files.
ResourceException
Exception that arises when requested resource cannot be loaded properly.
ResourceLoader
Access to resources of interest to the app and its GUI.
ResultsException
Exception that arises due to issues when saving or reviewing the resulting files.
SourceFile
Source localization file, which is saved in the user's storage system, and will be translated into one or more target files.
Speech
Manages the text-to-speech functionality by accessing a TTS/speech API, for a variety of voices and accents, depending on the required localization.
SpeechException
Exception that arises when cognitive speech speaking over a text is interrupted.
TargetFile
Translation of a source file into a given target language, which can be reviewed and updated by the user.
TranslationCache
Builds and manages a database (SQLite) aimed at acting like a cachÃ© for requested and returned translations from the API, in order to alleviate API usage and speed up the execution of the program.
TranslationException
Exception that arises due to issues during the Translation process (more specifically, during contact with the API for the LLM).
TranslationManager
Manager for the translation and file managing process, combined.
TranslationMode
Translation mode, which encompasses the translation process from source file to target file.
UIException
Unrecoverable exception due to problems with building of the application's UI.
Vision
Manages the automatic description of a set of images by accessing a computer vision/image description API.
